DOC.brief_summary: A study to assess the effectiveness and tolerability of MK0653A and MK0653A versus Atorvastatin in lowering LDL-C levels.
DOC.criteria: Currently being treated with Atorvastatin 10 mg for at least 6 weeks Have Type 2 Diabetes Weight must be stable for more than 6 weeks before entering the study Consume more than 14 alcoholic drinks per week. Pregnant or lactating Have taken another investigation drug within 3 months of starting this study History of congestive heart failure, heart attack, coronary artery bypass surgery Uncontrolled high blood pressure HIV positive History of cancer in the last 5 years
